title: Albions England Or historicall map of the same island: prosecuted from the liues, actes, and labors of Saturne, Iupiter, Hercules, and Ã†neas: originalles of the Brutons, and English-men, and occasion of the Brutons their first aryuall in Albion. Continuing the same historie vnto the tribute to the Romaines, entrie of the Saxones, inuasion by the Danes, and conquest by the Normaines. With historicall intermixtures, inuention, and varietie: proffitably, briefly, and pleasantly, performed in verse and prose by William Warner.
author: Warner, William, 1558?-1609.
publicationStmtPublisher: By George Robinson [and R. Ward] for Thomas Cadman, dwelling at the great north-doore of S. Paules Church at the signe of the Byble,
